title: Satisfaction Survey for Code.org's CS Fundamentals 5-day Summer Professional Development Workshop

elements.name: intro_text
elements.html:
Well done, you've completed the Code.org CS Fundamentals Intro workshop!

This survey asks questions about your experience today. Your feedback is crucial to ensuring we best serve educators through continual program improvement.

Privacy and Confidentiality

  • Your individual responses here are completely confidential.
  • Your identity will never be revealed publicly or used to tie any responses back to you personally.
  • We may share de-identified, aggregate data (representing all responses) publicly.
  • Your de-identified responses will be used by Code.org, our Regional Partners, and our facilitators for program improvement.

elements.name: overall_success
elements.title: Overall
elements.description: How much do you agree or disagree with the following statements about the workshop overall?

rows.text: I feel more prepared to teach the material covered in this workshop than before I came.
I know where to go if I need help preparing to teach this material.
This professional development was suitable for my level of experience with teaching CS.
I feel connected to a community of computer science teachers.
I would recommend this professional development to others.
This was the absolute best professional development I’ve ever participated in.

elements.name: teacher_engagement
elements.title: Engagement
elements.description: How much do you agree or disagree with the following statements about your level of engagement in the workshop?

rows.text: I found the activities we did in this workshop interesting and engaging.
I was highly active and participated a lot in the workshop activities.
I am definitely planning to make use of ideas and content covered in this workshop in my classroom.

elements.name: supported
elements.title: What supported your learning the most today and why?

elements.name: detracted
elements.title: What detracted from your learning today and why?

elements.name: curriculum_impressions
elements.title: Curriculum
elements.description: Having attended the workshop, what are your overall impressions of the {workshop_course} curriculum?

rows.text: I am going to love teaching with this curriculum.
I understand what CS Fundamentals courses look like, including lesson plans, online activities, and unplugged activities.
I understand which courses and lessons are most appropriate for my students.
I understand all of the tools and technologies I can use in the curriculum.

elements.name: feedback_venue_logistics
elements.title: Do you have feedback about the venue and the way logistics were run for this workshop? Please be specific and provide suggestions for improvement.

elements.name: anything_else
elements.title: Is there anything else you’d like to tell us about your experience at this workshop?

templateElements.name: facilitator_effectiveness
templateElements.title: Facilitator
templateElements.description: During my workshop, {panel.facilitatorName} did the following:

rows.text: Built and sustained an equitable learning environment in our workshop.
Kept the workshop and participants on track.
Helped me see ways to create and support an equitable learning environment for my students.
Demonstrated a healthy working relationship with their co-facilitator (if applicable).

templateElements.name: k5_facilitator_did_well
templateElements.title: What were two things {panel.facilitatorName} did well?

templateElements.name: k5_facilitator_could_improve
templateElements.title: What were two things {panel.facilitatorName} could do better?

elements.name: last_text
elements.html: Lastly, we would like to know a little about you, your background, and if we can stay in touch with you.

elements.name: year_of_birth
elements.title: What is your year of birth?

elements.name: race
elements.title: What is your racial or ethnic identity?

choices.text: Native Hawaiian or other Pacific Islander

elements.name: permission
elements.title: Permission
elements.description: I give the workshop organizer permission to quote my written feedback from today for use on social media, promotional materials, and other communications.

choices.text: Yes, I give the workshop organizer permission to quote me and use my name.
Yes, I give the workshop organizer permission to quote me, but I want to be anonymous.
No, I do not give the workshop organizer my permission.

elements.name: willing_talk
elements.title: Would you be willing to talk to someone at Code.org about your PD experiences?
